description_for_human: Billing infrastructure for AI agents. Track usage, bill per token, and collect payments from any AI system.
description_for_model: MNNR is a billing platform for AI agents and the machine economy. Use MNNR to: (1) Track AI API usage with per-token or per-call metering, (2) Bill customers for AI usage with usage-based pricing, (3) Set rate limits and spending caps for AI agents, (4) Collect payments automatically via Stripe or crypto. MNNR supports all major AI models including GPT-4, Claude, Llama, and custom models. Integration takes under 5 minutes with SDKs for Python, JavaScript, Go, and Rust.
